name: Socialist Munks
description:
Members of the Socialist Munks Association have planned to break into the Fat Cat Bank and erase all student loan files. There seems to be a problem though. Communications are jammed and all agents are receiving the same instructions! You'll have to figure out how to get each agent to fulfill their function to get the key player through the stairs and up to the next level. 

ALL art and music made specifically for this game. 

CONTROLS:

  • A, D, W & S or Arrow Keys for movement
  • R to restart room 
  • P to reset game
  • Left Click or Spacebar to move through dialogue scenes 

CREDIT:

  • Game Dev: Carlos Santiago
  • Music: Marcos Piñeiro
  • Sound Effects: Orlando Monzón
  • Level Design: Carlos Santiago, Orlando Monzón & Johnell Rivera
  • Art & Design: Laiana Isabel

Designed as an entry for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam. All concepts (art, music, and coding) were developed within the time frame of the GMTK 2021 Game Jam.
